name: Holiday Inn Express Maryville

reviews.text: I booked a 2-night stay at the Holiday Inn Express Maryville over a weekend and got a clean, comfortable room with friendly staff. The Holiday Inn Express properties I've stayed in have been pretty consistent. You know you're going to get a clean, comfortable room with a minimum level of standards and a good breakfast in the morning.
reviews.title: Good choice in Maryville

description: Welcome to the newest Maryville Missouri hotel . This Holiday Inn Express Maryville Missouri hotel is conveniently located on US Business 71 Highway and is with in walking distance of Applebee s, Italian and Mexican restaurants. This Maryville Missouri hotel is the home of Northwest Missouri State University, and the State of Missouri Correctional Facility. Special in room amenities are free high-speed Internet and free local calls. Business: Kawasaki, Federal Mogul, Energizer, NuCor, Deluxe Business Forms, Robbins Lightning Protection and Wal-Mart Hospitals: St. Francis Hospital Universities: Northwest Missouri State University and Conception Abbey Local Attractions are Northwest Missouri State University, Mozingo Lake and Golf Course, Bilby Ranch Conservation Lake and Squaw Creek Wildlife Preserve. The Holiday Express hotel's staff will make you feel right at home whether you re traveling for business or pleasure. You will agree that when traveling to Maryville, MO, the Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites is the smart place to stay!
